data.name: Chimera JIRA
data.description:
Based on Trelloified JIRA by Jono Mingard
The goal of this style is to make Notes, Labels, and others (surfaced on a card) and Milestones (stories beginning with "Milestone") more prominent visually.

data.name: Toonator Dark 2.0
data.description: A purple & black dark theme for Toonator. Self explanatory.

data.name: NWS Forecast Page - Dark
data.description:
Dark theme for National Weather Service local forecast page (forecast.weather.gov). So far this works only on the new NWS page format.

Does not work on *.noaa.gov pages (including translated pages like the old format Spanish page, for example).

Does not evenly shade headers of pages linked from the forecast.weather.gov local forecast page due to the way some of the header images are implemented, and tends not to work on other *.weather.gov pages.

All of these are surmountable problems. I just don't feel that motivated.

data.name: Custom osu!

Custom background wallpapers

data.name: Dark Fark Blue
data.description: this is a combination of Cleaned Up Dark & Dark Fark with a color shift to blue instead of green. It's a total hack so one is just pasted below the other & the hex for the colors altered. works with foobies too.
